name: Shenzhen Saike Electronic Co., Ltd
overview:
Shenzhen Saike Electronic Co., LTD, found in 2004, is a professional manufacturerÂ of electronic article surveillance (EAS) equipment and is a member of China Security Products Trade Association. For years Saike has been providing installation scheme, EAS products and technical service for retail chain, clothing industry, high-end manufacturing industry, and important public places etc. Saike is one of the few domestic manufacturers who have independent R&D center with its own factory and is also the first company that introduces infrared induction technology into EAS system. The infrared induction series products, which had been patented, are proved to be great effectively on reducing false alarm rate. Various metal detector, e.g. X-ray luggage scanner, underground metal detector, handheld metal detector, under vehicle search mirror, walkthrough metal detector, etc. Â  Also take special orders to meet clients various requirements.Â  Appreciate cooperation in any form.
